# delegate

**Instance Property**

An object that acts as the delegate of the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIDocumentPickerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentPickerDelegate] protocol.

## Getting the user-selected document

- **UIDocumentPickerDelegate**: A set of methods for tracking when the user selects a document or destination, or cancels the operation.
- **allowsMultipleSelection**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select more than one document at a time.
- **directoryURL**: The initial directory that the document picker displays.
